project_plan.name: Python-Based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Develop a Python-based quiz game that poses multiple-choice questions to the user, tracks their score, and displays the final score at the end.

task.name: Define quiz questions and possible answers in a variable
Implement the logic for displaying questions to the user
Implement user input handling to choose answers
Track user's score based on their answers
Display the final score to the user at the end of the game
Write tests for each of the functionalities mentioned above
Execute tests on the quiz game to ensure that all functionalities work correctly
